name: Attuned_Defenders_Bastion_D
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Defenders and may be slotted into any Defender damage power.
power_short_helps: Enhances Accuracy, Damage, and Reduces Endurance Cost
